title: Don’t Call Tony Fadell an Asshole—He Prefers ‘Mission Driven’
content: In his new book Build, the founder of Nest gets into how to be an effective leader, why the metaverse is bunk, and when quitting is a virtue.
description: In his new book Build, the founder of Nest gets into how to be an effective leader, why the metaverse is bunk, and when quitting is a virtue.
